text: This scoping review mapped the peer-reviewed literature relating to MHL surveys and interventions to improve The 'lay people' pattern refers to MHL domains mostly reported in studies of community-based residents, students (university or school), and others; the 'health professionals' pattern refers to MHL domains mostly reported in studies among health professionals (specialised, general, or GPs); and the 'patients or carers' pattern refers to MHL domains studied among patients with mental disorders and their carers MHL in China during 1997-2018. It included 303 epidemiological surveys and 47 interventions and described their geographic distribution, study design, mental disorders, assessment tools and domains of MHL covered.
